definition_en: An independent judicial body within the NRC that conducts hearings and makes decisions on licensing applications.
definition_ko: 면허 신청에 대한 청문회를 실시하고 결정을 내리는 NRC 내부의 독립적인 사법 기구.

slots.context_ko: (5) compilations of legal decisions and orders of the Commission and Atomic and Safety Licensing Boards...
